title: Under Trump, consumer watchdog to slash industry supervision
summary: The CFPB, under pressure from Trump and Elon Musk, will cut financial industry oversight by 50%, retreating from key areas like student loans, medical debt, digital payments, and consumer data–narrowing its focus almost entirely to protections for military personnel
